dcterms:description: The breast cancer dataset consisted of data from 119 patients who underwent postoperative radiotherapy following breast-conserving surgery. The dataset includes CT images with pixel spacings ranging from 0.77 to 0.97 mm and slice thicknesses of 5.0 mm.
dcterms:title: Breast cancer dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Babier
B. Zhang
R. Mahmood
K. L. Moore
T. G. Purdie
A. L. McNiven
T. C. Chan
dcterms:description: The nasopharyngeal cancer (NPC) dataset consisted of data from 139 patients who received radiotherapy for primary lesions. The dataset includes CT images with pixel spacings ranging from 0.75 to 0.97 mm and slice thicknesses of 3.0 mm.
dcterms:title: Nasopharyngeal cancer (NPC) dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Babier
B. Zhang
R. Mahmood
K. L. Moore
T. G. Purdie
A. L. McNiven
T. C. Chan
dcterms:description: The head and neck cancer dataset from the AAPM OpenKBP challenge contains 200 training cases, 40 validation cases, and 100 testing cases. The dataset includes CT images with consistent spacing and size.
dcterms:title: Head and neck cancer dataset
